Concept: Friday time-window absolute percent move (07:30→14:00 CT)
Indicator_Computation: Compute % change between price at 07:30 CT and 14:00 CT on Fridays (convert to broker time via offsets).
Signal_Logic: After 14:00, if abs(%Δ) >= threshold, emit one-shot LONG if Δ>0, SHORT if Δ<0. Guard prevents re-fire.
Notes: Map abs %Δ to sizing scalar if desired; pair with risk regime filter.

Indicator_Computation: z-score of ΔVIX over rolling N; optionally include 1–3 bar lags.
Signal_Logic: Enable risk-off plays (long JPY/CHF, short AUD/NZD) when VIX_Z >= z_th; apply hysteresis to avoid churn.
Notes: Gate entries; combine with correlation stability monitor.

Concept: Positioning Ratio Index (institutional vs retail blend)
Indicator_Computation: Weighted blend of COT net z, retail long/short ratio (z), and inst–retail divergence (z).
Signal_Logic: Use oscillator bands: PRI >= +1 → contrarian short bias; PRI <= −1 → contrarian long bias; neutral otherwise.
Inputs: {"components": ["COT_NET_Z", "RETAIL_RATIO_Z", "INST_RETAIL_DIV_Z"], "blend": "weighted", "weights": {"COT_NET_Z": 0.5, "RETAIL_RATIO_Z": 0.3, "INST_RETAIL_DIV_Z": 0.2}, "update_freq": "weekly/daily mix", "notes": "Carry-forward weekly COT; daily retail feeds."}
Notes: Good for contrarian filters and take-profit tightening at extremes.
